Features How It Works

Create Smart Forms with AI

Transform your ideas into professional Google Forms instantly. Our AI generates relevant questions, provides split-screen organization, and creates synthetic test data with controlled sentiment.

Split-Screen Interface

Left side for manual question building, right side for AI-generated questions. Drag and drop to reorder, shuffle questions, and organize your form efficiently.

AI Question Generation

Simply enter your form title and let AI generate relevant, diverse questions automatically. Add more questions anytime with the "Add More" button.

Synthetic Response Testing

Generate fake responses with controlled sentiment (positive/neutral/negative). Perfect for testing forms and creating sample data instantly.

Smart Question Management

Shuffle generated questions, drag to reorder, edit existing ones, and move questions between manual and generated sections seamlessly.

Google Forms Integration

Instantly create real Google Forms with your questions. Get a shareable link and start collecting responses immediately.

How It Works

Create professional forms in just 5 simple steps

1

Enter Form Title

Type your form title and let AI understand what kind of form you want to create.

2

Generate Questions

3

Build & Organize
